actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act so as to eliminate, in certain cases, the requirement that an insured individual have first been admitted to a hospital in order to qualify under such title for the extended care services provided thereunder.

summary.text: Eliminates, in specified cases, the requirement that an individual insured under the Medicare provisions of the Social Security Act have first been admitted to a hospital in order to qualify for the extended care services provided thereunder.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act so as to eliminate, in certain cases, the requirement that an insured individual have first been admitted to a hospital in order to qualify under such title for the extended care services provided thereunder.
